DOC.brief_title: Cervical Ripening With Cook Catheter Plus Low Dose Oxytocin
DOC.criteria: 1. singleton pregnancy 2. reassure fetal status time presentation 3 . Bishop Score < 6 1 . Closed cervix 2 . Breech presentation 3 . Multiple gestation 4 . Recent vaginal bleeding 5 . Placenta previa 6. non reassure fetal status 7 . Active genital herpes infection
